snippet: BOTTEX--Seymour E. 93, "Haitian painter," died. He is known for his colorful scenes and unique style "Modigliani" like female figures. His paintings are on exhibition in US, Italy, France and England. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BOTTEX--Seymour E. 93, "Haitian painter," died. He is known for his colorful scenes and unique style "Modigliani" like female figures. His paintings are on exhibition in US, Italy, France and England. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BOTTEX, SEYMOUR E
